Title: Local Kung Fu 2
Actors: Kenny Basumatary, Utkal Hazowary, Tony Deori Basumatary, Suneet Bora
Plot: Local Kung Fu 2 is an action adaptation of William Shakespeare's Comedy of Errors with a twist One pair of twins - the pair who grew up in Guwahati - knows fighting, whereas the other pair - from Tezpur - don't.
